CreateAccessor.name: CreateAccessor
CreateAccessor.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon Managed Blockchain accessor

CreateMember.name: CreateMember
CreateMember.description: Grants permission to create a member of an Amazon Managed Blockchain network

CreateNetwork.name: CreateNetwork
CreateNetwork.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon Managed Blockchain network

CreateNode.name: CreateNode
CreateNode.description: Grants permission to create a node within a member of an Amazon Managed Blockchain network

CreateProposal.name: CreateProposal
CreateProposal.description: Grants permission to create a proposal that other blockchain network members can vote on to add or remove a member in an Amazon Managed Blockchain network

DeleteAccessor.name: DeleteAccessor
DeleteAccessor.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon Managed Blockchain accessor

DeleteMember.name: DeleteMember
DeleteMember.description: Grants permission to delete a member and all associated resources from an Amazon Managed Blockchain network

DeleteNode.name: DeleteNode
DeleteNode.description: Grants permission to delete a node from a member of an Amazon Managed Blockchain network

GET.name: GET
GET.description: Grants permission to send HTTP GET requests to an Ethereum node

GetAccessor.name: GetAccessor
GetAccessor.description: Grants permission to return detailed information about an Amazon Managed Blockchain accessor

GetMember.name: GetMember
GetMember.description: Grants permission to return detailed information about a member of an Amazon Managed Blockchain network

GetNetwork.name: GetNetwork
GetNetwork.description: Grants permission to return detailed information about an Amazon Managed Blockchain network

GetNode.name: GetNode
GetNode.description: Grants permission to return detailed information about a node within a member of an Amazon Managed Blockchain network

GetProposal.name: GetProposal
GetProposal.description: Grants permission to return detailed information about a proposal of an Amazon Managed Blockchain network

Invoke.name: Invoke
Invoke.description: Grants permission to create WebSocket connections to an Ethereum node

InvokeRpcBitcoinMainnet.name: InvokeRpcBitcoinMainnet
InvokeRpcBitcoinMainnet.description: Grants permission to invoke the Bitcoin Mainnet RPCs

InvokeRpcBitcoinTestnet.name: InvokeRpcBitcoinTestnet
InvokeRpcBitcoinTestnet.description: Grants permission to invoke the Bitcoin Testnet RPCs

InvokeRpcPolygonMainnet.name: InvokeRpcPolygonMainnet
InvokeRpcPolygonMainnet.description: Grants permission to invoke the Polygon Mainnet RPCs

InvokeRpcPolygonMumbaiTestnet.name: InvokeRpcPolygonMumbaiTestnet
InvokeRpcPolygonMumbaiTestnet.description: Grants permission to invoke the Polygon Mumbai Testnet RPCs

ListAccessors.name: ListAccessors
ListAccessors.description: Grants permission to list the Amazon Managed Blockchain accessors owned by the current AWS account

ListInvitations.name: ListInvitations
ListInvitations.description: Grants permission to list the invitations extended to the active AWS account from any Managed Blockchain network

ListMembers.name: ListMembers
ListMembers.description: Grants permission to list the members of an Amazon Managed Blockchain network and the properties of their memberships

ListNetworks.name: ListNetworks
ListNetworks.description: Grants permission to list the Amazon Managed Blockchain networks in which the current AWS account participates

ListNodes.name: ListNodes
ListNodes.description: Grants permission to list the nodes within a member of an Amazon Managed Blockchain network

ListProposalVotes.name: ListProposalVotes
ListProposalVotes.description: Grants permission to list all votes for a proposal, including the value of the vote and the unique identifier of the member that cast the vote for the given Amazon Managed Blockchain network

ListProposals.name: ListProposals
ListProposals.description: Grants permission to list proposals for the given Amazon Managed Blockchain network

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to view tags associated with an Amazon Managed Blockchain resource

POST.name: POST
POST.description: Grants permission to send HTTP POST requests to an Ethereum node

RejectInvitation.name: RejectInvitation
RejectInvitation.description: Grants permission to reject the invitation to join the blockchain network

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add tags to an Amazon Managed Blockchain resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from an Amazon Managed Blockchain resource

UpdateMember.name: UpdateMember
UpdateMember.description: Grants permission to update a member of an Amazon Managed Blockchain network

UpdateNode.name: UpdateNode
UpdateNode.description: Grants permission to update a node from a member of an Amazon Managed Blockchain network

VoteOnProposal.name: VoteOnProposal
VoteOnProposal.description: Grants permission to cast a vote for a proposal on behalf of the blockchain network member specified
